entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle late this morning and this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or periods of drizzle changing to a few flurries this evening and ending before morning then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
